title: Can't download League of Legends on my new Window 10 desktop
body: For some reason, I cannot download league of legends due to some error 1935 that keep popping up whenever i tried to download league. The downloading wizard that help setting up the download isn't following through. Can anyone plz help me ;-;

replies.body:
A 1935 installation error is typically caused by corrupt or missing parts of Microsoft Visual C++, which is a component that League heavily relies on. You can usually resolve this by [completing all available Windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/) and [uninstalling all current versions of Visual C++ 2005](http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-uninstall-an-app-or-program-in-windows-10/), then follow up with installing a fresh copy using [this link.](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this resolves it for you.

theres a lot  of problems with leage n windows 10. people say try compatibility mode, try flushing dns or  this or that, n the shit doesn't work lol.  and riot doesn't care enough to pay attention to this stuff "submit a ticket with ur logs and well get back to you... in a year"
